newsitem.title: HUNGARY: BEES ATTACK HORSEDRAWN CART IN HUNGARY, KILL HORSE.
newsitem.headline: BEES ATTACK HORSEDRAWN CART IN HUNGARY, KILL HORSE.

text.p: A swarm of maddened bees attacked a horsedrawn cart in southern Hungary, killing one horse and seriously injuring the three passengers, newspapers and state radio said.

It took firefighters wearing protective gear two hours to disperse the swarm with firehoses and rescue the two adults and one child aboard the cart in the hamlet of Kajanujfalu, near Szentes, the daily Nepszabadsag said on Thursday.
There was no explanation for the attack by the bees who swooped on the cart from a nearby field, the paper said.
